title: Header
usage: Use the header component to provide a GOV.UK style header

homepageUrl.title: Homepage URL
homepageUrl.description: The url of the homepage. Defaults to /

serviceName.title: Service name
serviceName.description: Header title that is placed next to GOV.UK. Used for product names (i.e. Pay, Verify)

serviceUrl.title: Service URL
serviceUrl.description: Url for the service name anchor

productName.title: Product name
productName.description: Header title that is placed next to GOV.UK. Used for product names (i.e. Pay, Verify) - IS THIS NOT DUPLICATING serviceName???

assetsPath.title: Assets path
assetsPath.description: The public path for the assets folder. If not provided it defaults to /assets/images

navigationClasses.title: Navigation classes
navigationClasses.description: Optional classes that can be added to the navigation section of the header

containerClasses.title: Container classes
containerClasses.description: Optional classes that can be added to the container, useful if you want to make the header fixed width
